channel.title: 718 ChronicScape || Renewed and improved
channel.description:
Hey guys server is back out and on a VPS and now I just need one more thing... You! So feel free to join and take a peek for a second and see how fun it can be. I guarantee you will not want to leave!
Hello all the server is back up and running with an all new cache system with a lot of things fixed! A lot more content and some great staff. I have been reworking the server for a while and have gotten at least enough done to host it. We gladly welcome you to Chronicscape 718 server to have fun!
Server Features Include: -Beginner Character Customization -3 Dwarf Cannons -Jadinko Lair Like RS -Polypore Dungeon And Polypore Items Made Like RS -TzHaar City With Shops And Drops Like RS -Fairy Rings -Kiln, Fight Cave, Nomad, Dragon Slayer -Dominion Tower With Rewards -Dungeoneering (Not killing npcs for exp) -Toolbelt Working With Skilling -Item Interactions When Equipped -Yell Chat Color Able To Change -Tanner And Armor Crafting -Interfaces Working Properly For Skilling -WildyWorms -Sunfreet Boss -Kalphite Queen Full Lair -Bork Working -RuneCrafting At Each Altar With Teleports -Impling Catching As Well As Other NPC Hunting -Runespan -EOC Hair Commands -Godwars With Legit RS Drops -Thieving Guild -Can Light Beacons -Nomad Capes With Custom Skillcape Emote -Mithril Seeds -Old Dragon Claws -TokHaar-Kal Cape Upgraded Version -Feed A Pet 5 Time To Make It Grow Into The Next Stage -Snelm Crafting -Several Custom Items -QBD -Pest Control -Nomad -Custom Titles and Skill Capes -Thieving Guild -Much More..
There is many things to be seen so please feel free to check itout and have some fun!
Website -> [url=http://kingoroch1006.wix.com/chronicscape718]http://kingoroch1006.wix.com/chronicscape718[/url]
Webclient -> [url=http://kingoroch1006.wix.com/chronicscape718#!webclient/c21nl]http://kingoroch1006.wix.com/chronicscape718#!webclient/c21nl[/url]
Desktop Clients: Goto Homepage and Hover Mouse Over More
Forums -> [url=http://chronicscape718.forumotion.com/]http://chronicscape718.forumotion.com/[/url]
Media: [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/vy5wxs.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/mk9glw.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/qsjzwk.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/ehnofq.png[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2h5jqea.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/20k8uog.png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2yossvt.png[/img]

item.title: 718 ChronicScape || Renewed and improved
item.dc:creator: @mogging mogging
item.description:
@mogging wrote:

Got some new items and several fixes to ensure full gameplay. Will be fixing SOF today or tomorrow at the latest as well.

Read full topic

item.title: 718 ChronicScape || Renewed and improved
item.dc:creator: @xdeon xdeon
item.description:
@xdeon wrote:

Hey guys server is back out and on a VPS and now I just need one more thing… You! So feel free to join and take a peek for a second and see how fun it can be. I guarantee you will not want to leave!

Hello all the server is back up and running with an all new cache system with a lot of things fixed! A lot more content and some great staff. I have been reworking the server for a while and have gotten at least enough done to host it. We gladly welcome you to Chronicscape 718 server to have fun!

Server Features Include:
-Beginner Character Customization
-3 Dwarf Cannons
-Jadinko Lair Like RS
-Polypore Dungeon And Polypore Items Made Like RS
-TzHaar City With Shops And Drops Like RS
-Fairy Rings
-Kiln, Fight Cave, Nomad, Dragon Slayer
-Dominion Tower With Rewards
-Dungeoneering (Not killing npcs for exp)
-Toolbelt Working With Skilling
-Item Interactions When Equipped
-Yell Chat Color Able To Change
-Tanner And Armor Crafting
-Interfaces Working Properly For Skilling
-WildyWorms
-Sunfreet Boss
-Kalphite Queen Full Lair
-Bork Working
-RuneCrafting At Each Altar With Teleports
-Impling Catching As Well As Other NPC Hunting
-Runespan
-EOC Hair Commands
-Godwars With Legit RS Drops
-Thieving Guild
-Can Light Beacons
-Nomad Capes With Custom Skillcape Emote
-Mithril Seeds
-Old Dragon Claws
-TokHaar-Kal Cape Upgraded Version
-Feed A Pet 5 Time To Make It Grow Into The Next Stage
-Snelm Crafting
-Several Custom Items
-QBD
-Pest Control
-Nomad
-Custom Titles and Skill Capes
-Thieving Guild
-Much More…

There is many things to be seen so please feel free to check itout and have some fun!

Website -> http://kingoroch1006.wix.com/chronicscape718

Webclient -> http://kingoroch1006.wix.com/chronicscape718#!webclient/c21nl

Desktop Clients:
Goto Homepage and Hover Mouse Over More
